description:
pandas is a full-featured Python library for data analysis, manipulation, and visualization. This video series is for anyone who wants to work with data in Python, regardless of whether you are brand new to pandas or have some experience.

This is video 1 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: What is pandas? (Introduction to the Q&A series)
